favourite.article: Edwin Hatch was a distinguished lecturer in ecclesiastical history at Oxford and a professor of classics at Trinity College in Quebec. His lectures "On the Organization of Early Christian Churches" were translated into German by the noted theologian Hamack. Few other English theologians had won European recognition for original research. - Great Songs of Faith by Brown and Norton -------------------- The original of this hymn is titled "Breathe on me, Breath of God", and each stanza starts with this line. The original uses the singular pronoun throughout.
